headline: A Fresh Look at Philip Morris International (NYSE:PM) Valuation Following Key FDA IQOS Submission and Dividend Momentum
summary: Philip Morris International (NYSE:PM) brought new evidence before the FDA's tobacco advisory committee to support keeping its IQOS heated tobacco products on the U.S. market as modified risk tobacco products. This regulatory checkpoint reflects PMI’s ongoing effort to expand smoke-free offerings while maintaining its reputation among income-oriented investors. See our latest analysis for Philip Morris International. Regulatory milestones like PMI’s recent push to keep IQOS on the U.S. market...

headline: Tesla, Netflix set to report earnings as US-China trade fight turns 'unsustainable': What to watch this week
summary: As investors enters shutdown week three, a US-China trade war, credit gesticulation, and an incoming oil glut are weighing on the market.
